#Libraries:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


#code cleaning:
```{r}
renames <- c('first_feeling','second_feeling','third_feeling','fourth_feeling')
survey.df <- read.csv("sentiment-survey-data.csv")

survey_formatted <- survey.df %>%
  rename(init_feel = 1, majority_feeling_guess = 2,instructor_feeling_guess = 3) %>%
  mutate(
    across(1:3, tolower)
  ) %>%
  separate(init_feel,renames, sep = ",") %>%
  drop_na()%>%
  filter(if_all((renames),~!str_detect(., "[0-9]|[\\p{So}\\p{Cn}]")))
survey_formatted 


```
